infos.value: Most excellent! The rumors were not untrue... If anything, they did not do you justice.
Hah hah hah! I've barely broken a sweat!
Sadali! You're next!
Tzztztzt...
What is it? What's happened?
What!? Oelde sprung a surprise attack!? Th' first pursuit force got sidetracked in a battle!?
Who are you talking to?
It takes getting used to. I was surprised the first time as well.
He's got some sort of device for speaking with those who're far away. Good for giving orders and such.
Another ancient relic...
If he can give commands to those out of earshot...
I think we just discovered the secret to Muraga's power...
Oelde, that rat... Ambushing us when I thought he was resting in th' village!
That sounds like Brother's...Mont's tactics, all right.
What're you saying!?
That even with such a powerful relic in your possession, you weren't skilled enough to wipe out Leonis.
If I'd been in command, Oelde's reign would be over.
You would take King Oelde's life?
Is he not your own father?
That callous man is no father of mine!
Not only did he abandon me, but he abandoned his own wife, my mother, to save his own damn neck!
My sword is yours, Muraga. I will prove more useful than that washed-up shinobi Rairyuu ever could.
Who the hell do you think you are!?
Yer think I'd fall for that, do yer?
You believe that I would betray you?
I'm afraid it is I who bears full responsibility for this situation.
I simply proposed an alliance between Hourne and Fennes so as to resist Rundall to the west.
Alas... Where have I erred? By what manner of fate did it come to this?
Allow me to step in and perhaps I can effect some sort of reconciliation between you and your father.
Reconciliation? There will be none of that.
Besides, you're not to blame.
Whether or not war was on the horizon...it would've come to this eventually...
However...I am still to blame for your future being stolen from you.
Is there nothing I can do to make amends and put my mind at ease?
If peace of mind is what you want...then allow me to strike down my father.
Do what you will with me in the aftermath.
But you must give me your word that my mother will be safe.
...So it must be, then.
Muraga, you will do all within your power to assist Sterne in defeating Oelde.
B-but, Y-Yer Holiness...
It's not a request, I'm afraid. Do you understand?
...Yes. But «Fortem» isn't coming with us. They're staying right here.
Sterne and Sterne alone joins us in th' pursuit. Those are my terms.
I see no problem with this.
Oh and Sterne, I have a gift to give you later on.
A gift!?
Yes. One that I believe will be well suited to your tastes.
What're you...?
May the light of the Crystals guide you.
